entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
